mapper.select: select d.department_name, s.* from staff s, department d where s.department_id = d.department_id
select * from patient where name like '%' || #{patient_name} || '%'
mapper.update: update staff set introduction = #{introduction} where staff_id = #{id}
update patient set memo = #{memo} where patient_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select p.name as patient_name, s.name as staff_name, to_char(mr.time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as time, mr.memo from patient p, staff s, medical_receipt mr where p.patient_id = mr.patient_id and s.staff_id = mr.staff_id and to_char(mr.time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{time} and mr.staff_id = #{id} order by mr.time

select p.name as patient_name, p.social_id, s.name as staff_name, s.staff_id, to_char(mr.treatment_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as treatment_date, pr.prescription_record_id, pr.prescription_name from patient p, staff s, prescription_record pr, medical_record mr where mr.medical_record_id = pr.medical_record_id and p.patient_id = mr.patient_id and s.staff_id = mr.staff_id and mr.medical_record_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update medical_record set memo = #{memo} where medical_record_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select ar.ward_id, ar.admission_record_id, p.patient_id, p.name as patient_name, s.name as staff_name, s.staff_id, d.department_name, mr.treatment_name, to_char(ar.admission_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as admission_date, to_char(ar.discharge_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as discharge_date from medical_record mr, admission_record ar, ward w, patient p, staff s, department d where mr.medical_record_id = ar.medical_record_id and s.staff_id = mr.staff_id and p.patient_id = mr.patient_id and w.ward_id = ar.ward_id and s.department_id = d.department_id and w.ward_id in (select ward_id from ward where ward_number = #{ward_number}) and (ar.discharge_date > (select current_date from dual) or discharge_date is null) order by w.ward_id

select ar.ward_id, ar.admission_record_id, p.patient_id, p.name as patient_name, s.name as staff_name, s.staff_id, d.department_name, mr.treatment_name, to_char(ar.admission_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as admission_date, to_char(ar.discharge_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as discharge_date from medical_record mr, admission_record ar, ward w, patient p, staff s, department d where mr.medical_record_id = ar.medical_record_id and s.staff_id = mr.staff_id and p.patient_id = mr.patient_id and w.ward_id = ar.ward_id and s.department_id = d.department_id
and s.staff_id in ( select staff_id from staff where department_id = (select department_id from staff where staff_id = #{id}) and staff_level = 1 )
and s.staff_id = #{id}
and (ar.discharge_date > (select current_date from dual) or discharge_date is null) order by w.ward_id
mapper.update: update admission_record set discharge_date = #{date} where admission_record_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select am.admission_memo_id, s.staff_id, s.name, am.memo, to_char(write_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as write_date from admission_memo am, staff s where am.writer_id = s.staff_id and admission_record_id = #{id} order by am.write_date

choose.when: insert into doctor_schedule values (1, #{id}, #{content}, to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'))
insert into nurse_schedule values (1, #{id}, #{content}, 'N', to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'))
update doctor_schedule set time = to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), content = #{content} where schedule_id = #{id}
update nurse_schedule set time = to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), content = #{content} where schedule_id = #{id}

mapper.update: update nurse_schedule set complete = #{complete} where schedule_id = #{id}
